tool_description: Get the latest Gold and Silver Rates of Major Indian cities.  Indian Live Gold And Silver Prices
name: Gold Rates India
title: Gold Rates India

api_list.name: Silver Rates in Indian States
api_list.description: Get the Latest Silver Prices in all Indian States and Unition Territories
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://gold-rates-india.p.rapidapi.com/api/state-silver-rates"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "gold-rates-india.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Silver History City Wise
api_list.description: Weekwise and Monthwise History for Silver Price in Indian Cities

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: add Type as   **monthly** / **weekly**   for monthwise data or weekwisedata

api_list.name: Gold Price History City Wise
api_list.description:
Get the History of Gold Prices from Previous Weeks for major cities by weekly or monthly

TenGram24K:  Price of 24Carat Gold
TenGram22K: Price of 22Carat Gold
change: change in 24 K Gold Price

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: add Type as   **monthly** / **weekly**   for monthwise data or weekwisedata

api_list.name: Gold Prices India CityWise
api_list.description:
This is New API for Gold Rates in India with Most of the state and cities data.



TenGram24K=> Rate of 10 Gram Gold of 24 K in INR
TenGram22K => Rate of 10 Gram Gold of 22 K in INR

Feel free to drop a message if you get into any trouble.

api_list.name: Gold Price Prediction/Forecast
api_list.description:
Forecast data for Gold Price for next 30 days.

You will gate the date, minimum price, maximum price and average price for the next 30 days.
